channel.title: Making Falador a pk zone
channel.description:
[code]if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true;[/code]
That isnt falador but i need to know what each one of these coords means so that i can make falador wilderness

item.title: Making Falador a pk zone
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

when i put the coords in regular pk it makes the wilderness level like -15 cuz its not in the wilderness any idea on how to fix that so its just 150 all over the city

Read full topic

item.title: Making Falador a pk zone
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

Yeah… just go to like… the north wall of falador and that Y coord is the number you put it for “absY <= ####” then go to east wall, and that X coord is what you put in for “absX <= ####”, then go to west wall, that X coord goes in for “absX >= ####”, then go to south wall and that Y coord is “absY >= ####”

Read full topic

@watch_n_lern wrote:

if ((coordY >= SW Coord) && (coordY <= NE Coord) && (coordX <= SW Coord) && (coordX >= NE Coorf) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true;

just replace the SW Coord and NE Coord with the correct coordinates.

item.title: Making Falador a pk zone
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

Uhm… I hope this helps you.

Go into your client class and search “public boolean nonWild()”.

                       [v absY <= ####]
                       --------X---------
                       |                       |
                       |                       |

[absX >= #### >] X X [< absX <= ####]
| |
| |
--------X---------
[^ absY >= ####]

I hope my drawing makes it easy for you to understand it. =/ (PS… don’t put in the arrows (They are the first symbol/letter between every parenthesis))

Read full topic
